QuestData.Title: The Missing Tracker
QuestData.Description: I can't in good conscience send you to the worg cave without warning you that the previous person we sent there hasn't returned.$B$BWe're prepared for the worst, but perhaps there's a chance that he's alive. We'd appreciate it if you helped him return -- Tracker Val'zij is one of the only hunters we have.
QuestData.LogDescription: Look for Tracker Val'zij inside Gimorak's Den, southeast of the Grom'arsh Crash Site.
QuestData.RewardText: This hurts bad, mon. Don't know if I'm gonna make it.
